title: Magento Commerce Migration Case Study | VindaMall
content:
# Magento Commerce Migration Case Study | VindaMall

Read case study of VindaMall’s seamless Migration to Adobe Magento Commerce. VindaMall gained 4X Orders, 60% new users and achieved 3.9 second of page load time with the platform upgrade.


Back To Work APAC Solution B2C SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth Support INDUSTRY Health & Beauty WEBSITE vindamall.com 62% New Users Gained 4X Boost in Orders 3.9sec Load Time Revitalizing Healthy & Hygienic Lifestyle with Exceptional Commerce Enriching eCommerce Solutions for Healthcare Industry Serving the high-end health and hygiene market for more than 3 decades now, VindaMall is all about offering real-time solutions and bringing world-class brands to Asian and global audiences. It aces in fine-tuning and offering high-quality hygiene products like tissues, incontinence care, feminine care, and baby care under ten key brands. With its age-old association with premium brands and exceptional paper-producing quality, VindaMall was all set to take a step forward. The brand wanted to enhance its customers’ shopping experience and become functional on eCommerce platforms. Krish helped VindaMall in upscaling its platform, enhancing its visibility, and becoming an engaging platform to grab the upcoming opportunities in the eCommerce business. Always deliver more than expected. Larry Page, Google co-founder Challenges Assessing the Roadblocks Magento version upgrade from Community to Adobe Commerce Enhancing module compatibility of iPay88 Comprehensive design audit to determine CX touchpoints Technical SEO errors Addressing the site security concerns Outdated UI hampering the customer experience Custom module upgrade required Solution Offering Exquisite commerce solutions VindaMall wished to bring an altogether new and easy shopping experience for their customers. Krish pitched in to offer its expertise in version upgrades by implementing Adobe Commerce, third-party, and custom extensions that led to an organized and synchronized multi-store view. Moreover, we helped VindaMall in improving its UI and site-wide performance using the optimized code as well as fixing technical SEO errors that helped it gain more traction. The Strategy VindaMall had a goal and it was to gain more audience, increase average order value, boost ROI, and enhance average load time. Team Krish worked to offer a seamless migration to Adobe Commerce with an aim to improve overall website performance, conducted an extensive technical SEO audit, and suggested corrective solutions to improve their UI that led to an unforgettable UX. By upgrading and implementing all custom module, we helped them eradicate the issues related to Commerce cloud compatibility. In addition, we created multi-website adobe commerce from a single-store community version to offer a systematic and clear view of their platform. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Siew Sue Ting Digital & Technology Assistant Manager, Architecture & Projects - Vinda Group SEA "We had a vision in mind for VindaMall that could reflect the same energy as Vinda Group, and the experts at Krish helped us achieve it with ease. The experience working with Krish has always been smooth. We are glad to have come across such a versatile eCommerce agency." Result Wiping off The Age-Old Barriers with Adobe Commerce Krish and its elite team of eCommerce specialists believe in offering a solution-oriented approach when presented with hurdles. We ensured that VindaMall gets to offer an engaging UI to its esteemed customers and brings comfort in navigating through its website. The brand offers multiple solutions that required a multi-window which was strategically crafted and implemented by our team of experts. With a new and fresh look of their website, VindaMall is receiving good traction with some mind-boggling statistics such as a hike of 62% in new customers, 4x increased order numbers, and a whopping 65% increase in revenue. This is what bespoke eCommerce solutions by Krish can do to your business! Get in Touch Next Case Study Fantasy World started its operations in Kuwait on April 28, 1996. It has become the pioneer in the toy industry in importing the finest of toys from across the world and retailing them in Kuwait. It became the region's first to introduce an upscale US-designed toy store concept. Since then, Fantasy World Toys ventured into becoming a leader in branded and specialty toys in Kuwait. It has grown to launch six physical retail stores in Kuwait and is considered one of the first choices for the latest, best, and most comprehensive range of toys. However, despite its enormous physical popularity, it faced obstacles while operating its eStore on its previous eCommerce platform. Hence, it reached out to Krish to revamp and enhance its eStore for a better in-digital-store experience. View Case Study Trusted by leading brands
